company.name: VNFT GROUP
company.description: VNFT Group is a leading company in Forwarding & Logistics, providing comprehensive freight solutions, including international shipping, customs clearance, and supply chain management. With an extensive partner network and a team of experienced professionals, VNFT Group is committed to delivering fast, secure, and cost-effective services, helping clients maximize operational efficiency in global trade.
